title: Necklace
description: single strand of small slightly flattened silver beads; one either side of naja; 38 squash blossom beads of graduation size; attached to beads with filed, pierced extensions; a silver banded, two flat triangular bezel mounted turquoise on each side;cast naja, set with 2 flat round turquoises at terminals  wound string  J.#410, Cat.#398.
